roleset.name: keep
roleset.note: RETAIN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'retain' based on sentences in financial subcorpus; 'retentive' based on BOLT-1. Comparison with 'keep'. No Vncls. (from retain.01-v)

roles.note: Purpose clauses show up in every concievable syntax; sometimes the purpose is part of the Arg1 NP, sometimes not. Sometimes they'reconnected in an S, sometimes as NP-PP, sometimes the NP is extractedfrom an S. Follow treebank's syntax and do the best you can. Sorry. (from retain.01-v)

example.name: retain-v: basic transitive
example.text: The British government retained the single golden share after selling its stake in Jaguar in...
example.arg: after selling its stake in Jaguar in

example.name: retain-v: with attributive
example.text: The company also retained attorney Martin P. Levin, a director of the company and former head of the Times-Mirror Publishing Group, as an adviser.
example.arg: attorney Martin P. Levin, a director of the company and former head of the Times-Mirror Publishing Group,

example.name: retain-v: purpose clause
example.text: The action followed by one day an Intelogic announcement that it will retain an investment banker to explore alternatives ``to maximize shareholder value,'' including the possible sale of the company.
example.arg: to explore alternatives ``to maximize shareholder value,'' including the possible sale of the company

example.name: retention-n: Arg0, 1
example.text: Stimulated platelets use serotonin to enhance their retention of procoagulant proteins on the cell surface.
example.arg: of procoagulant proteins on the cell curface

roleset.name: keep
roleset.note: RETENTIVE-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from retentive.01-j)

example.name: retentive-j
example.text: if they would nt be so anally retentive in what they wished to do .
example.arg: in what they wished to do
